title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
directions: Step 1:	Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Step 2:	Spray a 9x13 pan with cooking spray.
Step 3:	In a large bowl, combine cooked and shredded chicken, salsa, black beans, corn, cumin and chili powder.
Step 5:	Layer 2 tortillas on the bottom of greased pan.
Step 6:	NOTE: You may need to trim 1 tortilla to fit the gaps left by the two tortillas on each level.
Step 7:	Place half of the chicken mixture on top of tortillas and evenly spread across.
Step 8:	Sprinkle about 1/2-2/3 cup shredded cheese (about 1/3 of the bag)over chicken mixture.
Step 9:	Next pour 1/3 of enchilada sauce evenly over cheese.
Step 10:	Repeat layers of tortilla, chicken mixture, cheese and enchilada sauce then top with one last layer of tortillas.
Step 11:	Evenly spread remaining enchilada sauce over the top level of tortillas.
Step 12:	In a small bowl, combine sour cream and can cream of chicken soup.
Step 14:	Evenly spread over the top tortilla layer.
Step 16:	Cover with foil and bake at 350 degrees F for 35 minutes covered, then remove foil and bake for an addition 10 minutes or until cheese is completely melted and casserole is heated through.
ingredients: 3 large chicken breasts cooked and shredded
